author: nonamejane2016
title: Hyatt Burlingame
text: I really enjoyed the Hyatt Regency. I stayed here at the recommendation of a good friend. Everything was superb. The reason for the -1 star was because the room was a tad bit dusty and the windows didn't even semi open for fresh air. Also the Hyatt needs to work on their app and online website for guest usage. Other than that, I will just have to trust that they improve in those areas. Until next time...
